definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The government has also increased the budgetary allocation for nursing education,” she says.
sentences.chinese: 政府還增加了用於護理學教育的預算撥款，”她說。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the effect of emergency nursing teaching.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高急救護理學的教學效果。

sentences.english: NURS courses are included in the Bachelor of Nursing with Honours programme.
sentences.chinese: NURS科目乃護理學榮譽學士課程的科目。
